column5: I don't want to search through old threads for the simple fact that I'm lazy.  Can anyone who has an ATV rigged for ice fishing post some pics. I just picked one up and need ideas to haul my gear and remember seeing a thread about it last year.  Thanks
First thing that you have to do is to have the best tires possible for your Quad. I have the Mudlites with 1 1/8" lugs. And I never tought that tires would make so much diff.
Moosebunk had a real good post about that. Move your fingers and search....
Yeah Bunk did an excellent job on his ATV mods..... here's the link  Bunk's Post  Just scroll up to the begining of the thread
Thanks Leech!  That is basically what I am doing, except I will be making a 2up seat in there as well
Have shop, will loan and help.

oh i'm way ahead of you  First plan was to get the motor going and tune her up, but she started first pull  Then I charged the battery and no more pulling needed!  Next is some fresh paint and a lube job, then the building starts and I'm good to go
